name: Loop Trap
description:
The love of your life is caught in a loop!

While attempting to steal a priceless artifact from atop the accursed tower  you trigger a trap! Now your partner in crime is trapped within a crystalline loop

Roll her down the tower, while avoiding the defense system.
Don't worry, she cant feel a thing...

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D: move character. Your cloak allows you to fly
Space: Energy Wave
Left mouse Button: Stab your sword in the direction of the mouse

THINGS TO DO:
Make it prettier 
Make it sound better
Fix any bugs that may pop up
